CustomField.formula: IF( NumberOfMainProducts__c > 1, IMAGE ("/img/msg_icons/warning24.png", "More than 1 Main Products"), IMAGE ("/img/msg_icons/confirm24.png", "1 or less Main Product"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System will display exclamation mark icon if there is more than 1 Main Products selected to the Quote. Please verify EU Customs Rate and Overseas Freight Costs on Quote Line Item level
CustomField.label: More Main Products?
